column1:
Copy and paste affiliate tag from Eclick admin program page. You can specify multiple tags one per line.
(Ex. <img src="http://www.e-click.jp/applications/applicate/XXXX/税抜売上金額/識別コード" height="1" width="1" /> )

column1:
Enable or disable the eclick integration code on checkout success page.
Adds E-Click affiliate service's affiliate code to Magento Checkout Complete page with necessary parameters.
For details of E-Click affiliate service, please click here.
